meaningMnemonic: If there is <kanji>nothing</kanji> <kanji>wicked</kanji> about your <kanji>spirit</kanji> at all, you are a going to be an <vocabulary>innocent</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>simple minded</vocabulary> person.
